mapper.insert: insert into activity (at_id, at_uid, at_title, at_status, at_max_count, at_creation, at_content) values (#{at_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{at_uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{at_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{at_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{at_max_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{at_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{at_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update activity set at_uid = #{at_uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, at_title = #{at_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, at_status = #{at_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, at_max_count = #{at_max_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, at_creation = #{at_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, at_content = #{at_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where at_id = #{at_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select at_id, at_uid, at_title, at_status, at_max_count, at_creation, at_content from activity
